name.jp: イベント用イエロー風船

description.en: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your health by +150. Lasts for 6 hours.
description.ar: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your health by +150. Lasts for 6 hours.
description.br: Belos balões amarelos que aumentam sua saúde em +150. Dura 6 horas.
description.cns: 漂亮的黄色气球，可让您的生命值提高150点。 持续6小时。
description.de: Schöner Ballon der die HP um 150 erhöht.

description.th: ลูกโป่งสีเหลืองแสนสวยที่เพิ่มสุขภาพของคุณโดย +150 กินเวลานาน 6 ชั่วโมง
description.vi: Bóng bay màu vàng xinh xắn giúp tăng thêm 150 máu của bạn. Kéo dài trong 6 giờ.
